activities: YouEarnedIt provides a Software as a Service (Saas) web application to companies that are based or have a presence in Switzerland. Each employee has a user profile which may include personal data.
personaldata: The personal data held in the YouEarnedIt platform may include: First Name, Last Name, Email Address, Date of Birth, Employment start date/termination date, and a photo. All personal information is available for review and correction by the individual employee.
recoursemech: independent dispute resolution mechanism operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus (BBB)
